definitions.text: an organization founded and united for a specific purpose
an establishment consisting of a building or complex of buildings where an organization for the promotion of some cause is situated
a custom that for a long time has been an important feature of some group or society
examples: he had become an institution in the theater

definitions.text: the act of starting something for the first time; introducing something new
examples: she looked forward to her initiation as an adult
the foundation of a new scientific society

definitions.text: a hospital for mentally incompetent or unbalanced person
